Training_Program: The name of the training program completed by employees. Relevant for identifying different training initiatives within Lee's Market.
Completion_Count: The number of employees who have completed the specified training program. This metric helps in assessing the reach and effectiveness of training initiatives.
Quarter: The fiscal quarter during which the training program was completed. Used for temporal analysis of training completions.
Year: The year when the training program was completed. Allows for long-term tracking and comparison of training participation.
Training_Impact: A qualitative assessment of the impact of the training program on business operations. Could include notes on compliance improvements or operational efficiencies.
